title: Looking for peasants
body:
Need peasants for ranked 5s team.
Must be willing to carry me to the elo heavens on your broad peasant shoulders.
Much thanks.

replies.body: sure hit me up. im on all night. doing solo/duo atm with randoms.

ME! I'M A PEASANT!

I'm only level 24 and own 9 champs but that's a minor obstacle.

me plz
im a peasant 
Proof: im in 20 min LPQ
